name: Antminer S19 Pro Fleet (10 Units)
descriptions: A fleet of 10 Antminer S19 Pro miners, offering a combined hashrate of 1.1 PH/s. Lightly used for 6 months.

name: Whatsminer M30S++ Bulk Order (50 Units)
descriptions: 50 units of Whatsminer M30S++, perfect for scaling up a mid-size mining operation. Total hashrate of 5.5 PH/s.

name: 1 PH/s Hashrate Contract (12-Month)
descriptions: A 12-month contract for 1 PH/s of hashrate from a Tier-1 data center. All-in price, includes electricity and maintenance.
